brajYatraData.Name: Shri Banke Bihari Ji Mandir
brajYatraData.description: Banke Bihari Temple is located in Biharipura in Vrindavan Dham in Mathura district in India. It is one of the ancient and famous temples of India.
brajYatraData.tips: Visit early morning for peaceful darshan.

brajYatraData.Name: Radha Rani Mandir (Barsana)
brajYatraData.description: The Radha Barsana Temple is dedicated to Radha, the consort of Krishna, and is one of the most important pilgrimage sites.
brajYatraData.tips: Don’t miss the view from the hilltop.

brajYatraData.Name: Prem Mandir Vrindavan
brajYatraData.description: Prem Mandir was constructed by Jagadguru Kripalu Maharaj and dedicated to Radha Krishna.

brajYatraData.Name: Iskon Temple Vrindavan
brajYatraData.description: ISKCON Vrindavan is also called Sri Krishna Balaram Mandir, one of the major ISKCON temples.
brajYatraData.tips: Attend the morning aarti if possible.

brajYatraData.Name: Char Dham Mandir
brajYatraData.description: Char Dham Mandir is dedicated to the four sacred sites: Yamunotri, Gangotri, Kedarnath, and Badrinath.
brajYatraData.tips: Photogenic spot for traditional architecture lovers.

brajYatraData.Name: Rang Ji Mandir Vrindavan
brajYatraData.description: This temple is dedicated to Lord Ranganath (form of Vishnu) and built in South Indian architectural style.

brajYatraData.Name: Janambhumi Mathura
brajYatraData.description: The Krishna Janmasthan Temple Complex is a group of Hindu temples in Mathura, believed to be the birthplace of Lord Krishna.
brajYatraData.tips: Visit with proper ID; tight security at entry.

brajYatraData.Name: Radha Raman Mandir
brajYatraData.description: Radha Raman Temple is one of the oldest in Vrindavan, established by Gopala Bhatta Goswami in 1542 CE.

brajYatraData.Name: Radha Vallabh Mandir
brajYatraData.description: Radha Vallabh Temple, one of the oldest in Vrindavan, is dedicated to Radha and Krishna.
brajYatraData.tips: Temple known for unique style of bhajan.

brajYatraData.Name: Nidhivan Mandir
brajYatraData.description: Nidhivan is a sacred grove associated with divine pastimes of Krishna with Radha and gopis.
brajYatraData.tips: Area closes after sunset due to local beliefs.

brajYatraData.Name: Radha Gopinath Mandir
brajYatraData.description: One of the seven ancient temples in Vrindavan, established by Gaudiya Vaishnavas.
brajYatraData.tips: Visit in morning for peaceful darshan.

brajYatraData.Name: Radha Madan Mohan Mandir
brajYatraData.description: This temple is the oldest in Vrindavan and associated with Sanatana Goswami.
brajYatraData.tips: Offers hilltop view of Vrindavan ghats.
